descriptionHTML:
Gentleman Classic watch face for Android Wear smartwatches: Huawei Watch, Sony SmartWatch, Motorola Moto 360, Tag Heuer, Fossil Q, LG G Watch, Asus ZenWatch etc. Gentleman Classic Watch Face for business. Stylish & Elegant. This watchface is compatible with all Android Wear watches.

Gentleman Classic Watch Face features:
✔ Support both round and square displays
✔ Watchface for Android Wear watches
✔ Battery level
✔ Ambient mode
✔ Day of the week
✔ Day of the month
✔ Display seconds

How to use Gentleman Classic Watch Face for Android Wear smartwatches:
1. Once you install the app, the Gentleman Classic watchface will be automatically transferred to your watch. This may take a few minutes. You may have to wait for a while.
2. From smartwatches: Long press your watchface and select the one that you have installed.
From mobile: Run the "Android Wear" app and tap "More" button in the watchface section.
3. Enjoy your new Gentleman Classic Watch Face for Android Wear!

Follow us:
Google+ : https://plus.google.com/communities/110067937523867264256

More watchfaces:
FWF Market : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=bb.fwf.market
comments: Great watch face! One of my best purchases so far. Only 1 thing missing to be 5 Stars of pure perfection: I beg the developers to please add a TRUE square design for us, owners of an Asus Zenwatch 2 with square screen. Please implement and the rating will be perfect!!, Thanks for listening.
It's a great looking watch face, however. The 4 Roman Numeral is IV not IIII.  Minor issue, but it bugs me.
